settings.heading: Yamaha
settings.copy: RAM® Mounts offers a wide range of mounting solutions for your iPhone, iPad, iPod, and MacBook. With everything from form-fitting cradles to the popular RAM® X-Grip®, securing your device wherever you need it has never been easier. The versatility of RAM® systems allow you to efficiently move your device between your boat, car, desk, motorcycle, and much more. With IntelliSkin® and GDS® Technology™, protect your iPad from drops and rugged use with standardized GDS® charging pins. Compatible with a variety of GDS® vehicle docks and accessories. Explore the full line of Apple device mounts below.

settings.heading: RecDeck Mounts
settings.copy: Yamaha's brand new RecDeck for WaveRunners comes equipped with multiple attachment points for RAM® Mounts. With six total tracks on each side of the RecDeck, you can install multiple mounts utilizing RAM® track bases for fishing rods, GoPros, tie-downs and more. Yamaha also supplies platform caddies for coolers which include sides panels with pre-drilled holes — perfect for attaching RAM® drill-down mounts.

settings.heading: WaveRunner Mounts
settings.copy: The secret ingredient to the Yamaha WaveRunner's multi-mount system is the RAM® Tough-Ball™ with 1/4″-20 x .25″ threaded stud. Simply screw on two of these and attach any B size compatible arms and device holders. Add on a phone mount, fishfinder mount, GoPro mount and more. For larger devices like fishfinders, you’ll want the C size version of the RAM® Tough-Ball™ and C size mounting components.

settings.heading: Motorcycle Mounts
settings.copy: Compatible with a wide variety of Yamaha motorcycle handlebars, RAM® offers several mounting bases to build a custom mount to your specifications. Explore the many options to choose from including phone mounts, GoPro mounts, GPS holders for Yamaha motorcycles and more.
